summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dealer Management System after Google OAuth to username/password authentication change. All specified requirements fully tested and working. Backend APIs: 100% success rate (25/25). Frontend: Full authentication flow, role-based access, and navigation working perfectly.
passed_tests: Login page displays 'Dealer Management System' title
Login page has username and password input fields with proper data-testids
Backend /api/auth/login endpoint accepts username/password POST requests
Login with admin/admin credentials returns user with CRM role
Login with cre1/cre123 credentials returns user with CRE role
Login with reception/reception123 credentials returns user with Receptionist role
Invalid credentials return 401 error with proper error message display
Dashboard loads successfully after valid login with proper redirect
Sidebar shows 'CR Appointments' module label in navigation
Day View page displays appointments correctly
Settings page is accessible by admin users only
Role-based access control: CRE users cannot access Settings/Users pages
All backend API endpoints working (25/25 tests passed)
Session-based authentication working with cookie management
Appointments CRUD operations functioning properly
Dashboard statistics API returning correct data
User management API with proper role restrictions
Settings API with CRM-only update permissions
CSV export functionality with role-based access
Task management system working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (Authentication, navigation, role-based access, error handling all working)
